mapper.update: update alg_model set dat_sn = #{datSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usr_sn = #{usrSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, model_set_sn = #{modelSetSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ver_sn = #{verSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, model_address = #{modelAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, model_name = #{modelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, model_en_name = #{modelEnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, model_size = #{modelSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_open_src = #{isOpenSrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where model_sn = #{modelSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select model_sn, dat_sn, usr_sn, model_set_sn, ver_sn, create_time, model_address, model_name, model_en_name, model_size, is_open_src, comment from alg_model where model_sn = #{modelSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select model_sn, dat_sn, usr_sn, model_set_sn, ver_sn, create_time, model_address, model_name, model_en_name, model_size, is_open_src, comment from alg_model where model_set_sn = #{modelSetSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select date_format(alg_model.create_time,'%Y-%c-%d %h:%i:%s') create_time , alg_model.model_address,alg_model.is_open_src, alg_model.comment,alg_data.data_addr from alg_model left join alg_data on alg_model.dat_sn=alg_data.data_sn where alg_model.usr_sn= #{usrSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by alg_model.create_time desc

select model_sn from alg_model where model_set_sn =(select model_set_sn from alg_model_set where usr_sn=#{usrSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND model_set_name=#{modelSetName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and model_name=#{modelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
